hvigorErrorCodes.message: The useNormalizedOHMUrl settings of packages %s and the project useNormalizedOHMUrl:%s do not match.
solutions: Use the packages that match the project settings. If useNormalizedOHMUrl is not set, the default value false is used.

hvigorErrorCodes.message:
The useNormalizedOHMUrl can only be used in API 12 and later.
	at %s.

solutions: For the hap module, add the reason and usedScene fields to the permission reported in the preceding file.
For the har/hsp module, add the reason field to the permission of the error information in the preceding file.
Set .so file priorities with pickFirsts, pickLasts, or select option.
Make sure each .so file name is unique.

hvigorErrorCodes.message:
The type of target device does not match the device type configured by module: %s.
Required device type:%s, current module device type:%s
solutions: Make sure the deviceTypes field set in module.json5 under src/main of the module directory contains the required type.
Make sure the device types specified under target in the build-profile.json5 file of the module directory contain the required one.
Check whether the hvigorfile.ts or hvigorconfig.ts file contains any code that may change the module deviceTypes settings.
Perhaps you can check the parameter configuration of arguments in module level build-profile.json5
Troubleshoot the errors according to the following guidelines.

hvigorErrorCodes.message: A 'unknown type name' error has occurred.
solutions: Troubleshoot the errors according to the following guidelines.

hvigorErrorCodes.message: Invalid value of '%s' in the system environment path.
solutions: Correct the value, run hvigorw --stop-daemon to stop the daemon process, and then try again.
